conn_messages.conversion_site:
This is a Speedway Conversion Site!
Many options will be disabled
We do not have access to the networking equipment
You will need to use the Admin option to access the POSs`nIMC will not work on the POSs
10.xxx.xxx.10 will access the store's DNS/DHCP server, rebooting this fixes most issues

Follow Speedway Conversion KBs for guidance
conn_messages.RIS_10:
Store Found!
This is a RIS 1.0 store
conn_messages.RIS_20:
Store Found!
This is a RIS 2.0 store
Make sure to follow 2.0 KBs

command_messages.dex_smart_reload_start:
DEX Smart Reload started
This will take a few minutes
Another message will notify you when the pumps are back online
command_messages.dex_smart_reload_complete:
DEX Smart Reload completed
All pumps should be back online now
command_messages.dex_force_reload:
DEX Force Reload started
You will not be notified when the pumps are back online
